document.full_text: a fan from connecticut has paid 8,200 pounds ($13,360) to win a charity auction of pez sweets dispensers in the likeness of britain's prince william and his fiancee kate middleton ahead of this month's royal wedding.
document.title: u.s. bidder snags william and kate pez for $13,000
lines_and_colors: a fan from connecticut has paid 8,200 pounds ($13,360) to win a charity auction of pez sweets dispensers in the likeness of britain's prince william and his fiancee kate middleton ahead of this month's royal wedding.
